markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Exploration](/Traits.aspx?ID=66)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 631 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

An activity with this trait takes more than a turn to use, and can usually be used only during exploration mode.
name: Exploration
